title: Cottage pie with cauliflower mash
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon coconut oil, or more to taste', '3 large carrots, peeled and diced', '1 onion, diced', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '275g frozen peas, or more to taste', '4 cloves garlic, diced', '1 1/2 teaspoons curry powder', '1 1/2 teaspoons garlic powder', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 teaspoon ground paprika', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '900g beef mince', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '1 head cauliflower, cut into florets', '3 tablespoons butter', '3 tablespoons cream cheese', '1 egg, beaten']
